global.description: Akhri, baadh, oo cilmi baadhis ku samee in ka badan 8,000 oo qoraalo Islaami iyo kuwo caadi ah oo dhowr gujin ah

author-page.title: {author} | Buugaagta iyo Qoraallada
author-page.description-secondary: Akhri buugaagta uu qoray {author}. {author} oo sidoo kale loo yaqaan {authorSecondary}, wuxuu qoray {books} buug.
